name: Khushboo Welfare Society
briefDescription: Khushboo Welfare Society is a well accredited voluntary NGO providing services, to equip and empower the children and adolescents with mental and multiple disabilities, for equal participation in society.  We provide professional care, rehabilitation services for them, and at the same time sensitizing the society for their effective integration and support.  A range of education, training, vocational and therapeutic programs are used as tools to achieve our objectives. KWS has been working from past 20 years towards their cause of empowering Special Children and their Center is located in Sector-10 A, Gurgaon, India.At present, there is a range of structured educational, vocational and therapeutic programs in operation, which provide services of early detection and assessment of disabilities, determine individualized Intervention Plan, and intervention through special care for children with disabilities. The focus is on holistic development and education of the child through training in Activities of Daily Living (ADL), Speech and Language development, Physiotherapy, Expressive and Performing Arts, Recreational Activities and Counselling Support for the Parents.
